casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Theodore PITTMAN, Jr. No. 694P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006. Marilyn G. Ozer, Chapel Hill, for Theodore Pittman. W. Wallace Finlator, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: 174 N.C.App. 745 , 622 S.E.2d 135 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 19th day of December 2005 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th day of December 2006."
